sentences.sContent: Todd flew over the city in a hot-air balloon as a publicity stunt .
sentences.sCn: 作为一种宣传噱头，托德乘坐热气球飞越城市上空。

words.tran: 发育不良的；成长受妨碍的；长得矮小的
阻碍…发展（stunt的过去式及过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: something that is done to attract people’s attention, especially in advertising or politics

trans.tranCn: 阻碍…的正常生长或发展
trans.tranOther: to stop something or someone from growing to their full size or developing properly
